hero_section.title: Connecting you to real opportunities.
hero_section.paragraph: Commercial real estate services that create opportunities through our network, deal structures, and expertise.

how_we_can_help_you_section.title: How we can help you.
how_we_can_help_you_section.paragraph: You deserve the most favorable terms possible for your deal, and our agents are here to make sure you get them.

service.title: Property Acquisition
service.paragraph: Whether an investor or owner-occupant, Blokk Commercial Real Estate advises and assists in sourcing, analyzing and negotiating the purchase of commercial properties. Through experience and creativity, we strive to get the best deal for our clients.

service.title: Property Disposition
service.paragraph: Blokk Commercial Real Estate uses experience and creativity to source qualified buyers, maximizing price.

service.title: Tenant Representation
service.paragraph: Blokk Commercial Real Estate is here to advise and assess financial analytics, location, lease negotiations, and build out services.

service.title: Landlord Representation
service.paragraph: Through exhaustive market research and the implementation of a strategic positioning process, Blokk Commercial Real Estate is able to attract qualified tenants, preserving value to your property or development.

about_section.title: About
about_section.paragraph: Jordan Kim, founder of Blokk, is responsible for sourcing real estate opportunities for institutional investors, private equity, and high net worth investors. On behalf of his clients, Jordan diligently works to exceed traditional services by supporting, executing, and realizing investment strategies.

commitment.title: Professionalism
commitment.paragraph: When working with Blokk, you’ll never experience anything less than knowledgeable, efficient, honest advice and assistance from our brokers.

commitment.title: Enterprise
commitment.paragraph: Commercial real estate is rarely cut-and-dry. That’s why we’re committed to finding creative, efficient solutions for even the most challenging roadblocks.

commitment.title: Determination
commitment.paragraph: We believe in hard work, persistence and integrity while pursuing the needs of our clients.

acf.title: Where we’ve been.
acf.paragraph: Here is a list of states where we’ve had transactions. Reach out to us to be a part of where we’re going.

logo_specifics: Logo shows fine on both light and dark backgrounds.
Logo is different inside the mobile menu.
Logo is different inside the footer.

hero_section.title: Who is Blokk Commercial Real Estate?
hero_section.paragraph: At Blokk Commercial Real Estate, we enjoy solving problems and closing deals. More than that though, we enjoy adding value to our clients. Our ultimate goal is to be well rounded humans and share our energy with the world through our craft.

history_section.title: Our history
history_section.paragraph:
For nearly 10 years, Jordan Kim has been acquiring, leasing, and disposing real estate assets across the country. His career spans multiple market segments, including multi-tenant retail centers, capitalization of net lease portfolios, and representation of companies in complex office, retail and industrial transactions. 

While still in college, Jordan received his Georgia Real Estate License and amassed more than $5,000,000 in sales. After graduating with his B.S. in Finance from Georgia Southern University, Jordan joined the United States Marines Corps and served his country in Afghanistan (OEF 11-2).

Now, as the founder of Blokk Commercial Real Estate, Jordan is responsible for sourcing opportunities for institutional investors, private equity, and high net worth investors. On behalf of his clients, he diligently works to exceed traditional services by supporting, executing, and realizing investment strategies.

commitment.title: Professionalism
commitment.paragraph: When working with Blokk Commercial Real Estate, you’ll never experience anything less than knowledgeable, efficient, honest advice and assistance from our brokers.

commitment.title: Enterprise
commitment.paragraph: Commercial real estate is rarely cut-and-dry. That’s why we’re committed to finding creative, efficient solutions for even the most challenging roadblocks.

commitment.title: Determination
commitment.paragraph: We believe in hard work, persistence and integrity while pursuing the needs of our clients.

acf.paragraph: Here is a list of states where we’ve had transactions. Reach out to us to be a part of where we’re going.

hero_section.title: How we can help you.
hero_section.paragraph: You deserve the most favorable terms possible for your deal, and our agents are here to make sure you get them.

service.title: Property Acquisition
service.paragraph: Whether an investor or owner-occupant, Blokk Commercial Real Estate advises and assists in sourcing, analyzing and negotiating the purchase of commercial properties. Through experience and creativity, we strive to get the best deal for our clients.

subservice.title: Consultation
subservice.paragraph: The first step in commercial asset acquisition is determining exactly what it is you’re looking for. We’ll sit down with you and walk through all of your wants and needs for the property.

subservice.title: Survey
subservice.paragraph: Next comes the most time-consuming part: market survey. We’ll review properties in your determined area, within your specifications, and conduct a value analysis to ensure you’re getting the best possible deal.

subservice.title: Acquisition
subservice.paragraph: We’ll manage negotiations and communicate with lenders, buyers, and legal professionals on your behalf, so all you have to do is begin preparing for your next steps with your commercial property.

service.title: Property Disposition
service.paragraph: Blokk Commercial Real Estate uses experience and creativity to source qualified buyers, maximizing price.

subservice.title: Market Analyzation
subservice.paragraph: We’ll conduct comprehensive research of other properties like yours in your market in order to determine the most appropriate pricing and approach for property exposure.

subservice.title: Strategic Exposure
subservice.paragraph: In order to ensure that you receive competitive offers from qualified applicants, we strategically market your property through our extensive network of brokerages.

subservice.title: Execution
subservice.paragraph: Negotiations and closing are some of the least enjoyable steps of the asset disposition process. We’re here to mediate between your buyers, their lenders, and legal professionals so you can relax.

service.title: Tenant Representation
service.paragraph: Blokk Commercial Real Estate is here to advise and assess financial analytics, location, lease negotiations, and build out services.

subservice.title: Tenant Representation
subservice.paragraph: We’ll evaluate your needs, conduct a market survey, and execute lease negotiations to ensure that you find everything you need in a space at the rate you want.

subservice.title: Professional Facilitation
subservice.paragraph: To ensure that everything runs efficiently, we’ll represent both parties throughout the rental process.

subservice.title: Landlord Representation
subservice.paragraph: We’ll strategically market your asset, actively pursue new tenants, and mediate all lease negotiations to ensure that everything runs smoothly from start to finish.

service.title: Landlord Representation
service.paragraph: Through exhaustive market research and the implementation of a strategic positioning process, Blokk Commercial Real Estate is able to attract qualified tenants, preserving value to your property or development.

subservice.title: Market Analyzation
subservice.paragraph: We’ll conduct comprehensive research of other properties like yours in your market in order to determine the most appropriate pricing and approach for property exposure.

subservice.title: Strategic Exposure
subservice.paragraph: In order to ensure that you receive competitive offers from qualified applicants, we strategically market your property through our extensive network of brokerages.

subservice.title: Execution
subservice.paragraph: Negotiations and closing are some of the least enjoyable steps of the asset disposition process. We’re here to mediate between your buyers, their lenders, and legal professionals so you can relax.
